nodes.text: Conduit 398-GX14 was a power system conduit on the Starlight Beacon space station, located behind an access hatch near the entrance to the station's Jedi temple. Shortly after the station's official completion, a badly wired resistor hub inside the conduit nearly caused a station-wide power outage, but technicians Joss and Pikka Adren located and fixed the problem before any major issues could occur.
